Address.value: 825 BERKSHIRE BOULEVARD,SUITE 200, WYOMISSING, Pennsylvania, 19610, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Penn National Gaming Inc is the operator of gaming and racing properties and video gaming terminal operations in the U.S. It operates retail sports betting across the company's portfolio, as well as online sports betting, online social casino, bingo, and online casinos. It offers live sports betting at its properties in Indiana, Iowa, Mississippi, Nevada, Pennsylvania, and West Virginia.

value.name: Richard Primus
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
